mapper.select: SELECT id, name, create_time AS createTime FROM live_room WHERE name = #{name} LIMIT 1

SELECT r.id, r.name, r.create_time AS createTime,
IFNULL(u.userCount, 0) AS userCount, IFNULL(u.status0Count, 0) AS status0Count, IFNULL(u.status1Count, 0) AS status1Count, IFNULL(u.status2Count, 0) AS status2Count, IFNULL(u.status3Count, 0) AS status3Count,
c.lastActiveTime AS lastActiveTime
FROM live_room r
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT room_id, COUNT(*) AS userCount, SUM(status = 0) AS status0Count, SUM(status = 1) AS status1Count, SUM(status = 2) AS status2Count, SUM(status = 3) AS status3Count FROM live_user
AND create_time >= #{beginTime}
AND create_time <= #{endTime}
GROUP BY room_id ) u ON u.room_id = r.id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT room_id, MAX(create_time) AS lastActiveTime FROM live_comment
AND create_time >= #{beginTime}
AND create_time <= #{endTime}
GROUP BY room_id ) c ON c.room_id = r.id
AND r.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY userCount DESC
